Chapter 2. Introducing IBM watsonx.ai 15 2.1.4 Benefits of using watsonx.ai for businesses Adopting watsonx.ai offers several key advantages for enterprises looking to harness the power of AI:  Accelerated AI development: watsonx.ai simplifies the development process with pre-trained FMs and built-in tools for training and deployment.
